tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE customer_transactions (customer_id INT, transaction_id INT, amount DECIMAL(10,2), transaction_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE account_information (account_id INT, customer_id INT, account_balance DECIMAL(10,2), last_updated TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT REFERENCES accounts(account_id),
    transaction_type VARCHAR(15),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);
